ing: 2 fluid ounces coffee-flavored liqueur (such as KahluaÂ®)
1/2 cup whipped cream, or to taste (optional)
des: "Rich ice cream dessert drink perfect to serve at parties."
ins: Blend vanilla ice cream, milk, Irish cream liqueur, coffee-flavored liqueur, and amaretto liqueur in a blender until smooth; pour into a punch bowl and top with whipped cream.
